ddl:
CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.crypto_dash.blocks`
(
  `hash` STRING,
  size INT64,
  stripped_size INT64,
  weight INT64,
  number INT64,
  version INT64,
  merkle_root STRING,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  timestamp_month DATE,
  nonce STRING,
  bits STRING,
  coinbase_param STRING,
  transaction_count INT64
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.crypto_dash.outputs`
(
  transaction_hash STRING,
  block_hash STRING,
  block_number INT64,
  block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  index INT64,
  script_asm STRING,
  script_hex STRING,
  required_signatures INT64,
  type STRING,
  addresses ARRAY<STRING>,
  value NUMERIC
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.crypto_dash.transactions`
(
  `hash` STRING,
  size INT64,
  virtual_size INT64,
  version INT64,
  lock_time INT64,
  block_hash STRING,
  block_number INT64,
  block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  block_timestamp_month DATE,
  input_count INT64,
  output_count INT64,
  input_value NUMERIC,
  output_value NUMERIC,
  is_coinbase BOOL,
  fee NUMERIC,
  inputs ARRAY<STRUCT<index INT64, spent_transaction_hash STRING, spent_output_index INT64, script_asm STRING, script_hex STRING, sequence INT64, required_signatures INT64, type STRING, addresses ARRAY<STRING>, value NUMERIC>>,
  outputs ARRAY<STRUCT<index INT64, script_asm STRING, script_hex STRING, required_signatures INT64, type STRING, addresses ARRAY<STRING>, value NUMERIC>>
);

CREATE TABLE `spider2-public-data.crypto_dash.inputs`
(
  transaction_hash STRING,
  block_hash STRING,
  block_number INT64,
  block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  index INT64,
  spent_transaction_hash STRING,
  spent_output_index INT64,
  script_asm STRING,
  script_hex STRING,
  sequence INT64,
  required_signatures INT64,
  type STRING,
  addresses ARRAY<STRING>,
  value NUMERIC
);
